column3: Convergent GTK messaging application using the GNUnet Messenger service.
column4: Early alpha stage. In development. Not ready for usage beyond developers. "The goal is to provide private and secure communication between any group of devices." https://www.gnunet.org/en/applications.html 2022-05 https://www.gnunet.org/en/news/2022-05-messenger-gtk-0.7.0.html

column3: It is still difficult to get reliable chats between different devices. https://www.gnunet.org/en/news/2022-05-messenger-gtk-0.7.0.html

column1: User can extend network with node
